commit message: Fixed a null-pointer exception as reported from a crash error
updated to support LG Optimus 3D. thanks to Adam Chylek !

added some stuff so its possible to check if it can be used or not (for
gmail 2.3.5 update)
start service even if leds can't be used
added an intent-action to be able to add packages

some fixes for gmail 2.3.5, support for feedbacks even if leds can't be
used, always set led-brightness when screen is turned on

fixed so app can be used without modifiable leds, show a dialog about
gmail if accessibility is disabled
fixed so the app can be used without modifiable leds
better way to check if su exists
